content: It's useful, for people who work in non-english, to provide translations of the names of the resources. I've just published the alternate names we have here: http://build.fhir.org/codesystem-resource-types.html. If anyone wants to add additional languages, contact me privately to volunteer and I'll explain how.
see also http://build.fhir.org/glossary.html, for which contributions are welcome
